Module src
Package BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Server

Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Server.SocketServer
BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Server.GameServer
public class GameServer extends SocketServer
The GameServer class is responsible for creating and managing games and represents the server for the Dots And Boxes Game.
Author:
Ali Kaan Uysal, Bas Van Dijk

    Constructs a new GameSever to play Dots And Boxes.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameServer

      public GameServer(int port) throws IOException
      Constructs a new GameSever to play Dots And Boxes.
      Parameters:
      port - the port to listen on
      Throws:
      IOException - if the server socket cannot be created, for example, because the port is already bound.

  • Method Details

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Returns the port on which this server is listening for connections.
      Overrides:
      getPort in class SocketServer
      Returns:
      the port on which this server is listening for connections

    • acceptConnections

      public void acceptConnections() throws IOException
      Accepts connections and starts a new thread for each connection. This method will block until the server socket is closed, for example by invoking closeServerSocket.
      Overrides:
      acceptConnections in class SocketServer
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when waiting for a connection

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the server socket. This will cause the server to stop accepting new connections. If called from a different thread than the one running acceptConnections, then that thread will return from acceptConnections.
      Overrides:
      close in class SocketServer

    • handleConnection

      protected void handleConnection(Socket socket) throws IOException
      Creates a new connection handler for the given socket.
      Specified by:
      handleConnection in class SocketServer
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket for the connection
      Throws:
      IOException

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • addClient

      public void addClient(ClientHandler client)
      Adds the received client to the client list. Client enters the registered players list.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that will be added to the client list.

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient(ClientHandler client)
      Removes the received client to the client list. Client exits the registered players list.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that will be removed to the client list.

    • sendGameOverDisconnect

      public void sendGameOverDisconnect(Game game, ClientHandler client)
      Sends a game over message to all clients in the specified game when a client disconnects. Removes the game from the gamesMap and the disconnected client from the clients list.
      Parameters:
      game - The game that is over due to a client disconnection.
      client - The client handler of the disconnected client.

    • sendGameOver

      public void sendGameOver(Game game)
      Sends a game over message to all clients in the specified game when the game is over. Removes the game from the gamesMap.
      Parameters:
      game - The game that is over.

    • handleCurrentMove

      public void handleCurrentMove(ClientHandler client, String move, Game game)
      Handles the current move of a client in a game. Sends the move to all clients in the game and checks if the game is finished after the move.
      Parameters:
      client - The client handler of the player making the move.
      move - The move made by the client.
      game - The game in which the move is made.

    • getClients

      public List<ClientHandler> getClients()
      Returns the list of clients connected to the server.
      Returns:
      The list of clients.

    • containsUsername

      public boolean containsUsername(String username)
      Checks if a username is already taken by a client connected to the server.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username is already taken, false otherwise.

    • getQueueOfClients

      public List<ClientHandler> getQueueOfClients()
      Returns the list of clients in the queue waiting to start a game.
      Returns:
      The list of clients in the queue.

    • startGameConnection

      public void startGameConnection()

    • getGameWithUsername

      public Game getGameWithUsername(String username)
      Retrieves the game associated with the specified username. Searches through the gamesMap to find a game where the username matches either player1Name or player2Name.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      Returns:
      The game associated with the username, or null if no game is found.

    • startGame

      public void startGame(List<ClientHandler> clientList)
      Starts a new game with the specified list of clients. Creates a new instance of Game, sets the player names, adds the game to the gamesMap, and notifies the clients about the game connection status.
      Parameters:
      clientList - The list of client handlers participating in the game.
